---


Removed all IP protection ratings from the TVM models:

1. **TVM 1000**: Removed IP54 from features and specs
2. **TVM 2000**: Removed IP65 from features and specs
3. **TVM 4000**: Removed IP67 from features and specs
4. **Weather Resistant section**: Removed the IP65 mention in the kiosks page

All changes are in `InteractiveTVMCards.jsx` and `kiosks.astro`. No linting errors. The IP protection features are removed from all three TVM models.

```diff
              &lt;img src={airtelPaymentsBankLogo.src} alt=&quot;Airtel Payments Bank logo&quot; style=&quot;max-width: 140px; width: 100%;&quot; /&gt;
            &lt;/div&gt;
-           &lt;div class=&quot;partner-chip glass&quot;&gt;
-             &lt;img src={rupayLogo.src} alt=&quot;RuPay logo&quot; /&gt;
-           &lt;/div&gt;
          &lt;/div&gt;
        &lt;/div&gt;
```

</details>

</tool-use>
